title: "The Importance of Understanding Consciousness and Will for Personal Development"
first_phrase: In the preceding text, we explored the distinction between the conscious and unconscious mind in the ancient and modern world. Now in the final part, we will delve deeper into how understanding this distinction is crucial for personal development. We will also discover how the fluid or nervous energy in humans is controlled by consciousness and will, not reason, and how the focus of emission lies in the cerebral center. These concepts are crucial for anyone who seeks to unlock their magnetic potential. Let's explore this further.
content: Esta comprensión fundamental es la base para quien quiere progresar en el camino del desarrollo del propio potencial magnético. Es importante desarrolla el conocimiento de nosotros mismos. En el microcosmos hombre en efecto, aquello que es el fluido o la energía nerviosa es directo de la consciencia y de la voluntad, pero no de la razón. importante sviluppare consapevolezza di noi stessi. Nel microcosmo uomo infatti, quello che è il fluido o l’energia nervosa è diretta dalla coscienza e dalla volontà, ma non dalla ragione. El foco de emisión se encuentra ubicado en el centro cerebral, en el yo pensante y consciente (D), sede del pensamiento consciente, y es bajo la acción inmediata de la voluntad. Este yo central es simbolizado por el sulfuro, que es un fuego escondido en la tierra. El hombre esta entonces también compuesto de otras partes.
last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the fundamental composition of ourselves, including the fluid or nerve energy directed by consciousness and will, is crucial to progress on the path of developing our magnetic potential. This can be achieved through the practice of the mirror exercise, which helps to acquire greater self-awareness and presence, leading to a deeper understanding of ourselves and our bodies. By integrating the three main elements of body, vital spirit, and true consciousness or soul, symbolized by mercury, sulfur, and salt, respectively, we can transform, unite, and divide to reach our full potential.
